entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
